author: Alex Puncekar
description:
The pulpy subgenre sword & sorcery still thrives. From its emergence in the 1930s to now, sword & sorcery (S&S) has taken on many forms in order to fit the times. Too often has this bloody and exciting genre gripped (usually with an axe in the other hand) people’s imaginations, but it’s ability to mold […]

The post REVIEW: New Edge Sword and Sorcery Issues 5-7 appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: New Edge Sword and Sorcery Issues 5-7
